text: Shrek is a 2001 video game based on the movie of the same name. It was released for the Xbox and Nintendo GameCube by TDK. It was also a launch title for the Xbox. ==References== Category:2001 video games Category:3D platformers Category:Nintendo GameCube games Category:Shrek video games Category:Single- player video games Category:Xbox games
title: Shrek (video game)
